observations: Anchor promotion drives new_users to +155% NDCG and +159% MRR lift, with +64% recall, satisfying the TK-101 targets.
Scenario S7 now averages 0.50 MRR with seven categories per slate, proving the first clicked item resurfaces quickly while diversity holds.
Recent_event_count still averages 4 (zero-history cases remain rare), but the injected starter anchors dominate with ~0.4 weight so curated tags guide the first page.

Candidate pools are still popularity-heavy (≈300 items, no collaborative/content contributions), so the coverage gains came purely from higher fan-out/MMR; unlocking collateral retrievers remains a future lever.
Keep monitoring starter anchor quality—the new prioritization makes their relevance critical to sustaining the MRR lift.
